alert.note: Alert for Estill (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 09 at 11:01PM EST until January 11 at 10:52PM EST by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Kentucky... Kentucky River near Ravenna affecting Estill County. Kentucky River at Heidelberg affecting Lee County. Red River at Clay City affecting Powell and Estill Counties. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM LATE TONIGHT THROUGH TUESDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Kentucky River near Ravenna. * WHEN...From late tonight to late Tuesday evening. * IMPACTS...At 21.0 feet, Low lying areas flood. Red Lick Road, Millers Creek Road, Dark Hollow Road, and Noland Creek Road flood in several places. At 21.5 feet, Sang Branch Road is under water at Red Lick Creek. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 10:15 PM EST Sunday the stage was 19.4 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage overnight and continue to a crest of 24.4 feet by Monday evening. It will then fall below flood stage by Tuesday afternoon. - Flood stage is 21.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. The next statement will be issued by 11 AM Monday.
